frontmatter.title: SimplyWrite, a free web distraction writing tool

node.excerpt: I like to write and I like programming so the obvious consequence were to write some tool to write. More or less this is the history of SimplyWrite.

GeoServer is one of the most importants open source geospatial servers nowadays. Implemented in Java, based on the powerful GeoTools libraries, GeoServer offers a great degree of interporability publishing data from major spatial data sources using Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) standards.

node.excerpt: jQuery is one of the most used JavaScript libraries, if not the most used one, which allows to make great things with the big set of little tools it offers to the web developers: HTML/DOM manipulation, CSS manipulation, HTML event methods, effects and animations, AJAX, utilities, ... }; };
